TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: b l iː s k ɔː l d s t ɛ l ɐ æ s k ɚ d ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð ɪ s t ɪ ŋ ɪ d h ɚ f ʌ m ð ə ʃ t oʊ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ n oʊ p i s f aɪ v θ ɪ k s l p s ʌ v l uː tʃ iː s æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ d əl b ɑː b v iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l b l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k ɪ n d ɐ b ɪ k t oʊ f ɹ ɔ k f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ s ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː s θ ɪ ŋ ɪ n t ʊ t ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d p eɪ k s æ n d ɪ t ɹ ɪ l k ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ v ɛ n s d eɪ æ d ð ə t ɹ eɪ n ʃ t eɪ ʃ n
